#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code


      shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
      s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
      s->data_.push_back("put");
      s->data_.push_back(k);
      s->data_.push_back(v);
      shared_ptr<Marshallable> derivedPtr=std::dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
      kv_store_[k]=v;
      return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code


      shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
      s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
      s->data_.push_back("append");
      s->data_.push_back(k);
      s->data_.push_back(v);
      shared_ptr<Marshallable> derivedPtr=std::dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
      kv_store_[k]=kv_store_[k]+v;
      return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code


     shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
      s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
      s->data_.push_back("get");
      s->data_.push_back(k);
      shared_ptr<Marshallable> derivedPtr=std::dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
      *v = kv_store_[k];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  if(v->data_[1]=="get"){
    event.Set(1);
  }
 else if(v->data_[1]=="put"){
  kv_store_[v->data_[2].c_str()]=v->data_[3].c_str();
                event.Set(1);

  }
  else if(v->data_[1]=="append"){
                event.Set(1);

    map<string,string>::iterator it = kv_store_.find(v->data_[2].c_str());
    if(it == kv_store_.end()){
          kv_store_[v->data_[2].c_str()]=v->data_[3].c_str();

    }
  else
    {
        string s=(it->second+v->data_[3]).c_str();
        kv_store_[v->data_[2].c_str()]=s;

    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
